title: kaNNan tiruvaDi
sahitya:
kaNNan tiruvaDi eNNuga maname tiNNam azhiyA vaNNam tarumE


anupallavi

  tarumE nidhiyum perumai pugazhum karu mAmEnip-perumAn ingE


caraNam    nalamE nADIr pulavIr pADIr nila mAmaghaLin talaivan pugazhE
pugazh vIr kaNNan taghai shEramarar tOghaiyODa-surappaghai tIrppavanE
1:  karudiyin kaN munivarum pinnE tUmozhip-pulavOr palar tAmum
peridu ninran perumai enrEttum peTri kaNDunai vAzhttiDa vandEn
paritiyE poruL yAvirkku mudalE bhAnuvE ponshei pEroLit-tiraLE
karudi ninnai vaNangiDa vandEn kadirkoL vANmukham kATTudi shaTrE
 caraNam 2    vEdam pADiya jyOtiyaik-kaNDu vELvip-pADalgaL pADudark-kuTrEn
nAda vARk-kaDalin oliyODu naTramizh shol ishaiyaiyum shErppEn
kAdamAyiramOr kaNattuLLE kaDugiyODum kadirinam pADi 
AdavA ninai vAzhttiDa vandEn aNikoL vANmukham kATTudi shaTrE
